casebody.data:
Sandra D. LYNCH
v.
BROCK, SCOTT & INGERSOLL, PLLC. No. 321P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. Sandra D. Lynch, Pro Se. Thomas Brock, Clemmons, for Brock, Scott & Ingersoll, PLLC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 1st day of August 2005 in this matter for Extraordinary Writ of Certiorari pursuant to Article V:Rule 21(a)(2), the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th day of August 2005."
